settings.button1_text: Click Here For Resources That Help Support Teachers

settings.header: Take the Classroom Wherever Your Students Are!
settings.content: Watch renowned physics teacher Paul Hewitt bring the classroom alive in this complete series from the comfort of your home or in your classroom. Download the Conceptual Physics Alive: Introduction video for FREE! Simply add this video to your cart and use discount code CPAINTRO at checkout.

settings.header: Bring Science Exploration Home & Spark Your Student's Curiosity!
settings.content: The Physics AT HOME Experience Kit is designed with students in mind. With instructional guides to accompany each tool in the kit, us it as a supplement to hybrid or distance-learning.
